enUS:
Horadric Cube

Pul~Zod: 2 Runes + Gem
ÿc4== Add Socket (Normal) ==ÿc5

Magic: 3 P.Gems + Magic Item
Rare: 6 P.Skulls + Rare Item
ÿc4== Upgrade Unique ==ÿc5

Wep E>X: Lum+Pul+P.Emerald
Arm N>E: Tal+Shael+P.Diamond
Arm E>X: Ko+Lem+P.Diamond
zhTW:
赫拉迪克方塊
